abstract: Spanish tapas make a great way to entertain, perfect for a small city kitchen.
snippet: Spanish tapas make a great way to entertain, perfect for a small city kitchen.
lead_paragraph: Translated to a home setting, Spanish tapas make a great way to entertain, perfect for a small city kitchen. Not at all a formal sit-down meal scenario, it works for a small group as well as a crowd. You can dispense with chairs, plates, even forks. All you need are napkins, glasses, toothpicks, and a few serving dishes.
